name: Samuel James
description: I’m a fun loving man with a sense of humor, I like spoiling my partner, giving and getting love, laughter and a special smile to let that special person know how much I care. I love with every inch of my being. I would like to meet someone, talk, get to know one another and look to the future. I like taking walks, holding hands, spending time with that special person. I am faithful, honest and and trustworthy man. I love to cuddle and snuggle on cold winter days, and rainy days too.
